text: Sahaba or As-Sahaba (), meaning the companions, refers to the companions, friends and family of the Islamic prophet, Muhammad.[Source: Al-Isâbah (1/4-5) of al-Hâfidh lbn Hajar] They are highly respected by Muslims and after saying any name of a sahabi, muslims usually say Radhiya llahu anhu (), which means "May God be pleased with them". == References == Category:Arabic words and phrases
title: Sahaba
